title.rendered: STEDI SURFACE MOUNTED TWIN GAUGE HOLDER

content.rendered:
Surface Mounted Twin Gauge Holder

OVERVIEW

Coming Soon.

ILLUMINATION

Coming Soon.

APPLICATION

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

Surface Mounted Twin Gauge Holder

  • Gauges have 360 degree rotation for vertical and horizontal mounting
  • Surface mounted pod

Key Measurements

  • Gauge Diameter 36mm
  • Overall height 50mm
  • Overall width 99mm
  • Overall depth 79mm

SPECIFICATIONS

Surface Mounted Twin Gauge Holder for dash

*This product only includes the Surface Mounted Twin Gauge Holder, accessories sold separately*

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

Surface Mounted Twin Gauge Holder

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
